name: Association of European Journalists
membership: Observer status at Council of Europe Steering Committee on Media and Information Society, CDMSI, since 2008
goal: Promoting free, independent and high quality journalism and media in Europe, safeguarding the welfare of journalists as professionals, engaging with EU institutions and bodies for the above goals, and promoting the AEJ as a network for sharing knowledge, skills and mutual support of members
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Public consultation and formation of High Level Group on fake news and online disinformation;
